member.name: ISyncMgrSyncItemContainer.GetSyncItem
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the item ID representing the desired item. The ID is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an instance representing the sync item.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise. Returns E_INVALIDARG if the handler does not recognize the ID specified at ppszItemID.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncItemContainer.GetSyncItemCount
member.summary: Gets a count of the sync items in the container.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the number of items in the container. This is the number of items enumerated by .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncItemContainer.GetSyncItemEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an interface that enumerates the handler's sync items.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an instance. IEnumSyncMgrSyncItems can be used to retrieve an interface for each sync item in the set.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncItemContainer
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide information to handlers about the items they contain.
